name: TrustLock
description: An encrypted desktop password manager with built in crypto features, todo-list, notepad and tons of customisability. Originally started as an internal tool that I made myself. My boss was impressed with it and decided we should turn it into a real world product. This is the free version

name: Cryptograph
description: Encode your messages in your favorite base or format and optionally add an encryption key to make sure the message is safe. The AES encryption is used for the secret key. I just thought it was a cool project to build.

name: Charter
description: Create stylish charts and download them in PNG or SVG at any size. This was a final project for a computer science course. I liked the idea of making cool charts.

name: Pokedex
description: This project uses the famous pokeapi. Find your favorite pokemon in the menu and check out its picture and stats. I'm planning to expand this project in the future to make better use of the very extensive pokeapi.
